movie.title: The Buddy Holly Story
movie.description_intro: The musical career of rock and roll pioneer Buddy Holly is chronicled, from the days when "Peggy Sue" was "Cindy Lou", a song about his first girlfriend, to the meteoric run of "That'll Be the Day" up the charts, to his marriage, breakup with the Crickets, reunion with the Crickets, and untimely death.
movie.description_full: The musical career of rock and roll pioneer Buddy Holly is chronicled, from the days when "Peggy Sue" was "Cindy Lou", a song about his first girlfriend, to the meteoric run of "That'll Be the Day" up the charts, to his marriage, breakup with the Crickets, reunion with the Crickets, and untimely death.

movies.title: Ride a Crooked Trail
movies.summary: After robbing a bank Murphy assumes the identity of his pursuer, a famous US Marshal, when he stumbles into a town and is confronted by the local judge, Matthau. Murphy is forced to remain as the new Marshal; an old flame, Scala, nearly unmasks him by accident, only to be forced to assume the ruse of being Murphy's wife. The "couple" given a house and respectability, which neither has had before. They maintain the charade to avoid hurting a young orphan boy, Matthau's ward. Scala is torn by her loyalty to boyfriend planning to rob the bank and growing feelings for Murphy.

movies.title: All Is Forgiven
movies.summary: A father and daughter are reunited some 11 years after the father's drug addiction tore the family apart.
movies.description_full: A father and daughter are reunited some 11 years after the father's drug addiction tore the family apart.
movies.synopsis: A father and daughter are reunited some 11 years after the father's drug addiction tore the family apart.

movies.title: Pony and Birdboy
movies.summary: Pony and Pigeonboy tells a story of seven-year-old girl Pony who doesn't want to go to school, and big-mouthed Pigeonboy who has solution to all possible problems.
movies.description_full: Pony and Pigeonboy tells a story of seven-year-old girl Pony who doesn't want to go to school, and big-mouthed Pigeonboy who has solution to all possible problems.
movies.synopsis: Pony and Pigeonboy tells a story of seven-year-old girl Pony who doesn't want to go to school, and big-mouthed Pigeonboy who has solution to all possible problems.

movies.title: Fluidity
movies.summary: Fluidity is the story of ten millennials currently living in New York City whose sexual lives are intertwined - but they don't know it. Each has a singular set of predicaments - but together they signify the lust, the pain, and the loneliness of a generation searching for connection. Fluidity explores young promiscuity in the way The Big Short explores Wall Street - with humor, eroticism, and emotion.

Fluidity explores young promiscuity in the way The Big Short explores Wall Street - with humor, eroticism, and emotion.
